thread.section_title: The Trafalgar Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great stay
thread.title_full: Great stay - Review of The Trafalgar Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah B
title: Great stay
text: I stayed in the trafalgar for 2 nights had a great stay. Queen deluxe room was very big and loads of space. Clean sheets and towels very comfortable bed. Perfect location in the centre of everything couldnt of picked a better location for sightseeing and the westend for theatre. I will definitely return the hotel staff were so kind and helpful even surprised my friend with a birthday card and some cake such a lovely gesture really made her stay feel more special. The only thing I could say that's anyway critical was maybe they could update there carpet from cream to a different colour because it looked a bit grubby but I checked the sheets towels etc spotless..I'd definitely recommend staying at the trafalgar we had a great stay
